description:
An IdentityProvider represents a SAML identity provider (IdP)
that is linked to your organization and trusted by the RightScale
dashboard to authenticate your organization's users.

Authorization.example: Failed to generate example for /Bearer [\w-]*/ : Sorry, "]*" is too vague, try setting a range: "]{0,3}"

ids.description: Comma separated list of IdentityProvider IDs

view.description: The view to use to render this resource

discovery_hint.description: Discovery hint by which to filter IdentityProviders

protocol_uid.description: Protocol-unique ID by which to filter IdentityProviders

ok.description: Standard response for successful HTTP requests.

global_session_forbidden.description: The global session provided in the user's cookie is forbidden.

id.description: ID of the IdentityProvider to show
